name: Moon's Road Trip
description:
Made for Mini Jam 130:Lunar

------------------------------------------

The moon has spent ages orbiting our blue marble. It's about time that it had a vacation. The moon will be mildly inconvenienced every 10 seconds for the duration of its trip. For the player, the biggest obstacle will be the mostly empty void, wonky physics, and a lack of audio.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move.
